Q1) Write a Java program to add an element to the end of an ArrayList.
package youtube;
import java .util.*;
public class Arraylistaddelenent {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
ArrayList<String> list=new ArrayList<>();
list.add("Raj");
list.add("Prasad");
list.add("Rhan");
System.out.println(list);
list.add("Mohan");
System.out.println(list);
}

}

Q2)  Write a Java program to add an element at a specified index in an ArrayList.
code==>
package youtube;
import java .util.*;
public class Arraylistaddelenent {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
ArrayList<String> list=new ArrayList<>();
list.add("Raj");
list.add("Prasad");
list.add("Rhan");
list.add(2,"Ankit");
System.out.println(list);


}

}

Q3)  Write a Java program to remove the first element from an ArrayList.
code==>
package youtube;
import java .util.*;
public class Arraylistaddelenent {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
ArrayList<String> list=new ArrayList<>();
list.add("Raj");
list.add("Prasad");
list.add("Rhan");
list.remove(0);
System.out.println(list);


}

}

Q4)  Write a Java program to remove the last element from an ArrayList.
code==>
package youtube;
import java .util.*;
public class Arraylistaddelenent {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
ArrayList<String> list=new ArrayList<>();
list.add("Raj");
list.add("Prasad");
list.add("Rhan");
list.remove(2);
System.out.println(list);


}

}


Q5)  Write a Java program to remove an element at a specified index from an ArrayList.
code==>
package youtube;
import java .util.*;
public class Arraylistaddelenent {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
ArrayList<String> list=new ArrayList<>();
list.add("Raj");
list.add("Prasad");
list.add("Rhan");
list.remove(1);
System.out.println(list);


}

}

Q6) Write a Java program to get the size of an ArrayList.
code==>
package youtube;
import java .util.*;
public class Arraylistaddelenent {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
ArrayList<String> list=new ArrayList<>();
list.add("Raj");
list.add("Prasad");
list.add("Rhan");
int size=list.size();
System.out.println(list);


}

}


Q7) Write a Java program to iterate through all the elements in an ArrayList.
code==>
package youtube;
import java .util.*;
public class Arraylistaddelenent {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
ArrayList<String> list=new ArrayList<>();
list.add("Raj");
list.add("Prasad");
list.add("Rhan");
for(int i=0;i<list.size();i++) {
	System.out.println(list.get(i));
}
}
}

Q8) Write a Java program to check if an element exists in an ArrayList.
code==>
package youtube;
import java .util.*;
public class Arraylistaddelenent {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
ArrayList<String> list=new ArrayList<>();
list.add("Raj");
list.add("Prasad");
list.add("Rhan");
int size=list.size();
	System.out.println(list);
}
}

Q9) Write a Java program to get the size of an ArrayList.
code==>
package youtube;
import java .util.*;
public class Arraylistaddelenent {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
ArrayList<String> list=new ArrayList<>();
list.add("Raj");
list.add("Prasad");
list.add("Rhan");
String element=list.get(2);
	System.out.println(element);
}
}
